## Setup

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(formattable)
library(tidyverse)
library(RSQLite)
library(shiny)
library(here)
library(glue)
library(DT)
```

```{r}
run_app = function(){
  con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), here("data", "companies.db"))
  companies <- tbl(con, "companies")
  dbDisconnect(con)
}
run_app()
```
